Got Questions? We Got You!

Everything you need to know about Specifys.ai!

What's Specifys.ai all about?
Specifys.ai is a complete AI-powered app planning ecosystem. Create specifications, discover tools, manage projects, and more.
Is there a free plan?
Yes! Get one specification free to try our platform. Additional specifications start at $4.90.
Can I edit my specifications?
Pro subscribers can edit all specifications. With purchased credits, you can edit saved specifications.
What is the Vibe Coding Tools Map?
Our curated collection of AI-driven development tools, organized by category.
How does the Tool Finder work?
Our AI analyzes your project needs and suggests the most suitable tools.
